H0.text: What was the occupation of St Peter, the leader of the Apostles. Merchant

H1.text: What was the occupation of St Peter, the leader of the Apostles. Carpenter

H2.text: What was the occupation of St Peter, the leader of the Apostles. Shepherd

H3.text: What was the occupation of St Peter, the leader of the Apostles. Fisherman

A4.text: A fisherman or fisher is someone who captures fish and other animals from a body of water, or gathers shellfish.
